text: Andrei Ovidiu Pițian (born 16 November 1995) is a Romanian footballer who plays as a centre back or defensive midfielder for Chindia Târgoviște.Fundașul Andrei Pițian a semnat cu FC Botoșani. fcbotosani.ro ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Liga I players Category:CS Pandurii Târgu Jiu players Category:FC Astra Giurgiu players Category:FC Botoșani players Category:AFC Chindia Târgoviște players Category:Cypriot First Division players Category:Apollon Limassol FC players Category:Romanian expatriate footballers Category:Romanian expatriate sportspeople in Cyprus Category:Expatriate footballers in Cyprus
title: Andrei Pițian
